name: Guidebot
description:
Guide the robots!

In this game, inspired by the Mario vs. Donkey Kong series, you must guide the robots to the goal. They can walk and jump automatically, but you will need to manipulate the environment to get them to where they need to be.

The only controls you need are a mouse or touchscreen. Use either of these to click or tap bots and red switches.

Features
  • 20 Levels across 4 areas
  • HD .svg based Sprites
  • Progress Saving
  • Robots

This game has plenty of firsts for me, as it is my first real Godot game, my first game to use well designed art and my first game in a long while. I am really proud of what has come out of this, seeing as I completed this project in less than a week.
